spectraltools.hulls package

Submodules

spectraltools.hulls.convexhulls module

Takes a spectral array and its ordinates and calculates a hull solution. This is a warpper to the extension chulls in spectraltools.ext.chulls

returns

hull quotient or hull removed or hull

rtype

NDArray

spectraltools.hulls.convexhulls.uc_hulls(ordinates: ndarray[Any, dtype[ScalarType]], data: ndarray[Any, dtype[ScalarType]], hull_type: int = 0) → ndarray[Any, dtype[ScalarType]]

uc_hulls Calculate either a hull quotient, hull removal or hull

Parameters

  • ordinates (NDArray) – ordinates of the spectra

  • data (NDArray) – 1D, 2D or 3D array of spectral data. Last dimension is the spectra

  • hull_type (int, optional) – 0 = hull quotient, 1 = hull removal, 2 = hull. Defaults to 0.

Returns

hull quotient or hull removed or hull

Return type

NDArray

spectraltools.hulls.phull module

spectraltools.hulls.phull.get_absorption(wavelengths: ndarray[Any, dtype[ScalarType]], spectral_data: ndarray[Any, dtype[ScalarType]], hull_type: int = 0) → ndarray[Any, dtype[ScalarType]]

Calculate either a hull quotient, hull removed or get the hull of the incoming spectral data

Parameters

  • wavelengths (NDArray) – the ordinates [#bands] corresponding to the spectral_data

  • spectral_data (NDArray) – 1D [#bands], 2D [N, #bands], 3D [N,M, #bands]

  • hull_type (int, optional) – 0 = hull quotient, 1 = hull removed, 2 = hull. Defaults to 0.

Returns

The hull solution according to the selected hull_type

Return type

NDArray
